ns0:Concept.displayName: Allergy to influenza split virion vaccine (finding)
Allergy to influenza surface antigen vaccine (finding)

ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of an allergy to influenza vaccines.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of allergy to influenza vaccines.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
